page.title: 04Donisthorpe Colliery.
page.content: PRODUCTION: All Donisthorpe output goes to the new preperation plant at Rawdon colliery with 90% of this continuing directly to C.E.G.B power stations. For management purposes Measham Colliery has been joined with Donisthorpe and the complex is now known as Donisthorpe/Measham Colliery. SURFACE: On the surface are the mine's administration and production control offices.The nerve centre is the control room, from which all underground conveyor belts are controlled.There is an underground air monitoring system,with samples being drawn from selected points in the mine to an analysing machine which transfers results onto a graph. DAILY saleable output 2,400 tonnes ANNUAL saleable output 565,000 tonnes Men on books 1,009 (Feb 84)
